CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1945, pg. 1 reads: "Opposes Bias - Madam Vijaya L. Pandit, India Congress leader, scored prejudice and color barriers in her address at the annual meeting of the Maternal Health Center, Monday, at the William Penn Hotel. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit wearing light colored sari, seated in carved wooden chair in William Penn Hotel
